org.easyrules.api

Interface Rule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JmxRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicJmxRule, BasicRule, CompositeRule

    public interface Rule
    Abstraction for a rule that can be fired by the rules engine. Rules are registered in the rules engine registry and must have a unique name.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean evaluate()
      Rule conditions abstraction : this method encapsulates the rule's conditions.
      void execute()
      Rule actions abstraction : this method encapsulates the rule's actions.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Getter for rule description.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter for rule name.
      int getPriority()
      Getter for rule priority.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate()
        Rule conditions abstraction : this method encapsulates the rule's conditions.
        Returns:
        true if the rule should be applied, false else

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Rule actions abstraction : this method encapsulates the rule's actions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if an exception occurs during actions performing
